characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Rhythm of War (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Isasik Shulin is the Alethi royal cartographer. He re-created smaller copies of maps for Dalinar that hung in the Gallery of his present dwelling.
Isasik rides with a large group of Navani's scholars and cartographers toward Narak at the center of the Shattered Plains to locate the Oathgate there.
According to Nazh, the instructors in the Calligraphers Guild, especially the self-proclaimed calligro-cartographer Isasik Shulin, have repeatedly told him that it is futile to pick apart the phonemes from old glyphs.
